caption.center: WILLIAM Robert "Bill" CLOTFELTER v. Lea McGowan CLOTFELTER.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Chancery Court, Jackson County; Kenneth B. Robertson, Chancellor.
opinion.attorneys:
Colingo Blackwell, Eddie C. Williams, Pascagoula, for appellant.
Johnston Steinberger, Albert S. Johnston, III, Pascagoula, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before PATTERSON, C.J., and SUGG and COFER, JJ.
